attributes.action: Boycott all goods from the EU if we do not leave on April 12th with “No Deal”
attributes.background:
The Government must respect Article 50 on April 12th

If we do not leave the EU on April 12th with “No Deal” we should Boycott all goods from the EU until we are “Allowed” to leave.

The will of the 17.4 million leave voters must be implemented.

If it is not Democracy is dead in Britain.

rejection.details: It seems like you are calling on other people to take action, not the UK Government or Parliament.
